title: context7_rollout_monitoring
description:
Context7 Progressive Rollout Monitoring Task - Monitoraggio attivo del rollout progressivo Context7 per la sostituzione del context management nativo Claude Code. 

📊 FASE ATTUALE: Shadow Mode (72h testing parallelo)

🔧 COMPONENTI DA MONITORARE:
- Progressive Rollout Monitor: .claude/hooks/progressive-rollout-monitor.py
- Metrics Command: python3 .claude/hooks/progressive-rollout-monitor.py metrics
- Status Command: python3 .claude/hooks/progressive-rollout-monitor.py status
- Context Interceptor: .claude/hooks/context-interceptor.py
- Context Safety Validator: src/core/semantic-memory/context-safety-validator.ts
- Enhanced Memory Bridge: scripts/memory-bridge-runner-safe.js
- Emergency Systems: .claude/emergency/context-rollback.sh + context-restore.sh

📈 SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- Token Savings: >20%
- Performance Gain: >15%
- Safety Incidents: 0
- Quality Score: >0.75
- Uptime: >99.5%

⏱️ TIMELINE:
- Shadow Mode: 72 ore (test paralleli senza sostituzione)
- Hybrid Mode: 168 ore (sostituzione selettiva)
- Full Mode: Produzione completa

🚨 ROLLBACK TRIGGERS:
- Safety incidents ≥1
- Performance degradation >25%
- Quality score <0.6
- Context poisoning detected

💾 FILE CONFIGURAZIONE:
- .claude/config/context-interceptor-config.json
- .devflow/context-management-config.json
- .devflow/verification-trigger.json

📋 AZIONI PERIODICHE:
1. Verificare metriche ogni 8 ore
2. Analizzare logs per anomalie
3. Validare criteri successo per progressione
4. Documentare insights e optimization
5. Preparare report per transizione Hybrid Mode

OBIETTIVO: Gestire la transizione sicura da context nativo Claude a Enhanced Memory System senza degradazione performance LLM
